sentences: Ma näitan sulle oma uut raamatut.
Sa peaksid teda näitama õigetele inimestele.
context: The Estonian verb 'näidata' is the da-infinitive form of 'näitama'. It means to show, demonstrate, display, or make something visible. This verb can be used when showing someone an object, pointing something out, or indicating a direction or position. In different conjugations it appears as näitan (I show), näitate (you show), näitavad (they show), etc.
